name: The Scifi
description:
The Scifi Is an Simulation Game About SCIFI

Aliens kidnap you for their operation, and you are trying to escape and reach the vehicle that will take you to planet Earth

The game is designed in a classic shape to be compatible with all devices, starting with Windows 7

System Requirements:

1 GB RAM

Processor: Intel 2 duo (minimum) Intel Core i3-2800 (Recommended)

Screen: 800x600 (minimum) 1280x720 (Recommended)

VRAM: 512Mb video card with DirectX 9.0 compatible drivers (“GeForce” or better)

OS: Windows 7 (minimum) Windows 10/11 (Recommended)

DirectX Version: Microsoft DirectX® 9.0

Space Required: 200 MB (After Extract The RAR File)
